title: Fix broken admin login authentication

requirements.text: Fix the admin login so that entering username 'admin' and password 'admin123' successfully authenticates and redirects to the main dashboard. Investigate and resolve any credential mismatch, hashing inconsistency, or state initialization issue in the authentication logic inside useAuth.ts and LoginPage.tsx.
acceptanceCriteria: Logging in with username 'admin' and password 'admin123' succeeds without any error message.
After successful login, the user is redirected to the authenticated layout (not kept on LoginPage).
A wrong username or password shows a clear error message without crashing the app.
The fix does not break existing user session persistence via localStorage.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Authentication data must continue to use localStorage as the persistence layer.
Do not change the backend Motoko actor schema or stable variable structure.
nonGoals: Adding new authentication methods or roles.
Migrating authentication storage from localStorage to the backend.
Changing any UI design or layout beyond fixing the login error.
